{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3590976,"name":"Ethan","username":"wyvern41","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/wyvern41/{size}/259165_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-13T19:51:31.940Z","cooked":"

When I go to download frc game tools from here, and click log in to download, it just reloads the page (I am already logged in). I tried to log out and do the same thing, but after I log in the problem still occurs. I am using windows 11.

NI download page broken? FIRST
Trying to install driverstation from NI, I click “log in to download”, log in, and it takes me back to the page which still says “log in to download”. Pressing this button again just reloads the page and the button doesn’t change.

I encountered the same problem yesterday, I resolved this by getting another teammate to send me the download file over discord.
This should work but I will find out when i use my computer as a driverstation at worlds, please let me know if it does: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/927255987755307061/1360703455974391878/ni-frc-2025-game-tools_25.0_online.exe?ex=67fd66d8&is=67fc1558&hm=1da6c5910a461fcc83de208bbd4057a32b3a5ae1f35c40cc6ff178790435ac5d&
